1.1.454 Transfer Control

Term TransferControl Prefix risk-owl
Label Transfer Control
IRI (owl)
IRI (canonical)		 https://w3id.org/dpv/risk/owl/#TransferControl
https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#TransferControl
Type rdfs:Class , owl:Class , risk-owl:RiskControl
Sub-class of risk-owl:RiskControl → dpv-owl:RiskMitigationMeasure → dpv-owl:TechnicalOrganisationalMeasure
in Domain of risk-owl:controls, risk-owl:transfers
in Range of dpv-owl:hasTechnicalOrganisationalMeasure, dpv-owl:isMitigatedByMeasure, risk-owl:hasControl
Definition Control that aims to transfer the event (or risk) to another context or entity
Usage Note Transfer implies moving (physically or logically) the event to another context or entity. While Risk Management methods indicate risk transfer as occuring between entities, this concept is defined more broadly by including 'context or entity' so as to enable modelling cases where the transfer takes place between processes - which may be managed by the same or different entity. Additionally, typical use of 'Transfer' implies a formal mechanism such as an agreement, which is absent from this concept. If only partial responsibility is tranferred, such as for a specific measure, then this can be considered as an instance of sharing the risk - for which risk:ShareControl is provided
Date Created 2025-01-06
Contributors n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1
Documented in Risk Risk-controls

1.1.455 Transparency Control

Term TransparencyControl Prefix risk-owl
Label Transparency Control
IRI (owl)
IRI (canonical)		 https://w3id.org/dpv/risk/owl/#TransparencyControl
https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#TransparencyControl
Type rdfs:Class , owl:Class , risk-owl:RiskControl
Sub-class of risk-owl:MonitorControl → risk-owl:ProactiveControl → risk-owl:RiskControl → dpv-owl:RiskMitigationMeasure → dpv-owl:TechnicalOrganisationalMeasure
in Domain of risk-owl:controls
in Range of dpv-owl:hasTechnicalOrganisationalMeasure, dpv-owl:isMitigatedByMeasure, risk-owl:hasControl
Definition Control that provides information about an event
Usage Note Transparency refers to the availability of information, whether for the same or different entity in relation to who establishes and operates the control, and where transparency implies having the means to obtain and use information about an event
Date Created 2025-01-06
Contributors [rdflib.term.BNode('n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b2'), rdflib.term.BNode('n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1')]
Documented in Risk Risk-controls

1.1.474 Very High Likelihood

Term VeryHighLikelihood Prefix risk-owl
Label Very High Likelihood
IRI (owl)
IRI (canonical)		 https://w3id.org/dpv/risk/owl/#VeryHighLikelihood
https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#VeryHighLikelihood
Type rdfs:Class , owl:Class , dpv-owl:Likelihood
Sub-class of risk-owl:5LikelihoodLevels → dpv-owl:Likelihood
Sub-class of risk-owl:7LikelihoodLevels → dpv-owl:Likelihood
in Range of dpv-owl:hasLikelihood
Definition Level where Likelihood is Very High
Usage Note The suggested quantitative value for this concept is 0.9 on a scale of 0 to 1
Date Created 2022-08-18
Contributors n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1
Documented in Risk Risk-levels

in Range of risk-owl:avoids, risk-owl:contains, risk-owl:controls, risk-owl:detects, risk-owl:eliminates, risk-owl:identifies, risk-owl:interrupts, risk-owl:intervenes, risk-owl:investigates, risk-owl:logs, risk-owl:mitigates, risk-owl:modifies, risk-owl:monitors, risk-owl:overrides, risk-owl:recovers, risk-owl:reduces, risk-owl:remedies, risk-owl:resolves, risk-owl:reverses, risk-owl:shares, risk-owl:substitutes, risk-owl:transfers

Type rdfs:Class , owl:Class , dpv-owl:RiskConcept , risk-owl:PotentialConsequence , risk-owl:PotentialRisk
Sub-class of risk-owl:PolicyRisk → risk-owl:LegalRiskConcept → dpv-owl:RiskConcept
in Range of risk-owl:avoids, risk-owl:contains, risk-owl:controls, risk-owl:detects, risk-owl:eliminates, risk-owl:identifies, risk-owl:interrupts, risk-owl:intervenes, risk-owl:investigates, risk-owl:logs, risk-owl:mitigates, risk-owl:modifies, risk-owl:monitors, risk-owl:overrides, risk-owl:recovers, risk-owl:reduces, risk-owl:remedies, risk-owl:resolves, risk-owl:reverses, risk-owl:shares, risk-owl:substitutes, risk-owl:transfers
Definition Concept representing Violation of Ethics Code
Usage Note This concept was called "ViolationEthicalCode" in DPV 2.0
Source ISO/IEC 27005:2018
Date Created 2022-08-17
Date Modified 2024-08-16
Contributors n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1
Documented in Risk Risk-taxonomy

in Domain of risk-owl:isExploitedBy, risk-owl:isVulnerabilityOf
in Range of risk-owl:causedByVulnerability, risk-owl:exploitsVulnerability, risk-owl:hasRiskAssessment, risk-owl:hasRiskIdentification, risk-owl:hasRiskManagement, risk-owl:hasVulnerability
Definition Intrinsic property of a system or asset that is utilised by the Threat Source in a Threat event to cause Risk

1.2 Properties

1.2.1 avoids

Term avoids Prefix risk-owl
Label avoids
IRI (owl)
IRI (canonical)		 https://w3id.org/dpv/risk/owl/#avoids
https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#avoids
Type rdf:Property , owl:Class
Sub-class of risk-owl:reduces → risk-owl:controls
Sub-property of risk-owl:reduces
Domain includes risk-owl:AvoidanceControl
Range includes dpv-owl:RiskConcept
Definition Indicates the event or action is avoided by the specified control
Date Created 2025-01-06
Contributors n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1
Documented in Risk Risk-controls

Label caused by threat
IRI (owl)
IRI (canonical)		 https://w3id.org/dpv/risk/owl/#causedByThreat
https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#causedByThreat

Range includes risk-owl:Threat
Definition Indicates the cause of associated context (subject) was the indicated threat (object)

Range includes dpv-owl:RiskConcept
Definition Indicates the specified event or action is contained by this control

1.2.5 control

Term controls Prefix risk-owl
Label control
IRI (owl)
IRI (canonical)		 https://w3id.org/dpv/risk/owl/#controls
https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#controls
Type rdf:Property , owl:Class
Domain includes risk-owl:RiskControl
Range includes dpv-owl:RiskConcept
Definition Indicates this control manages specified risk concept event or action, such as for risk sources, risks, consequences, and impacts
Examples Using Risk Controls to indicate measures adopted for a specific event (E0086)
Date Created 2025-01-06
Contributors n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1

https://w3id.org/dpv/risk#investigates
Type rdf:Property , owl:Class
Sub-class of risk-owl:controls
Sub-property of risk-owl:controls
Domain includes risk-owl:InvestigationControl
Range includes dpv-owl:RiskConcept
Definition Indicates the specified event or action is investigated by this control
Date Created 2025-01-06
Contributors n41931f8868104d2f84567d33a8115085b1
Documented in Risk Risk-controls
